In my free time you’ll usually find me with a camera in hand, exploring the Northern Irish terrain scouting out cute animals to photograph. I’ve also tinkered with many other areas of photography, one of my favourites being live music, shooting some of my favourite artists.

Pet Photography

As a huge animal lover, I love combining two of my favourite things - pets and photography. This year I’ve began offering my services to all pet owners with relaxed photo-sessions with you and your lovely pet at a location of your choice. I make sure we all have fun and we come away with some great shots that capture your little one’s personality.

If you’re interested in booking a photoshoot or finding out send me an email or message me on Facebook.

Check out past pet photoshoots on Facebook

Want to work with me?

As well as pets, I also help out clients with their photography needs, from fun events to local businesses. If you think I could help you, get in touch to arrange a chat.
